title: Liability for exceeding powers
context: §651-50 Liability for exceeding powers. The officer serving any execution shall act upon the officer&rsquo;s own private accountability, for all excesses of the officer&rsquo;s official powers, and for any departure from the legal import of the writ or mandate in the officer&rsquo;s hands. [CC 1859, §1028; RL 1925, §2452; RL 1935, §4153; RL 1945, §10180; RL 1955, §233-49; HRS §651-50; gen ch 1985]
